project_name.justification: The press release is titled 'Magellan Copper and Gold Corp. Announces Participatory Agreement with Gold Express Mines Regarding the Historic Atlantic Cable Gold Mine'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as 'Magellan Copper and Gold Corp. (OTC PINK:MAGE) ("Magellan" or the "Company")' in the first paragraph.

ceo_buyer.justification: The contacts section at the end of the document lists: 'Contacts: Magellan Copper and Gold Corp. Mike Lavigne, CEO'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement terms state: 'In doing so, Magellan will earn a 45% participatory interest in the project.'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is described as one of 'Montana's top tier bonanza-grade gold producers' and the historic resource includes '0.11 to 0.14 ounces gold per ton'.

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the input text to verify.

currency.justification: The text mentions a commitment of '$400,000'. The company is listed on a US exchange (OTC PINK) and the project is in Montana, USA, implying the currency is USD.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The agreement does not involve a direct cash payment for the asset. The consideration is an exploration commitment to be spent on the project.

share_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any payment in the form of shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The text does not mention a combined cash and share payment.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The text does not mention any issuance of shares as part of the agreement.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any payment in the form of share warrants.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any payment in the form of options.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the agreement, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is specified as a monetary value, not a drilling meterage.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text states: 'The agreement calls for Magellan to spend a minimum of $400,000 in development expenditures on the project over the next twenty-four months'.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or other royalty as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text provides two component areas, '480 acres of patented ground and 500 acres of unpatented mining claims', but does not state a single total area. A total cannot be calculated per the 'no calculations' rule.

coverage_area_unit.justification: As no single raw value for the coverage area is provided, the unit is also null.

resource_size.value: 207,000 tons grading 1.5 to 4% copper and 0.11 to 0.14 ounces gold per ton
resource_size.justification: The text describes a historic resource: 'This historic resource block...was estimated to contain 207,000 tons grading 1.5 to 4% copper and 0.11 to 0.14 ounces gold per ton.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified in the first paragraph as 'Magellan Copper and Gold Corp. (OTC PINK:MAGE)'.
